publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6011.1 Ms Wendy Alexander: Renfrew Ferry Saved—As an amendment to motion (S3M-6011) in the name of Bill Wilson, leave out after "service contract" to end and insert "by Strathclyde Partnership for Transport (SPT) to Argyll-based Silvers Marine; congratulates Silvers Marine on winning this contract; also congratulates all those who campaigned to keep a ferry crossing, particularly Renfrew local resident Liz Grant, and commends the hard work of officials at SPT to ensure that a service is retained on the Clyde, with no interruption in service to passengers, while also saving nearly £500,000 of taxpayers money." Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S3M-6011.1 Renfrew Ferry Saved (lodged on 24 March 2010) Mr Frank McAveety*, John Park*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Hugh Henry*, Helen Eadie*, Trish Godman*, Jackie Baillie*, Bill Butler*, Mary Mulligan*, Cathy Jamieson*
